game.name: Dirt Bike Extreme Stunts
game.description:
Are you ready to try your hands in a latest bike game where there are no limits to perform death-defying stunts? Join Dirt Bike Extreme Stunts and be prepared to enter the highly addictive and exciting platform where you have to control a bike while executing some crazy stunts on the extreme offroad tracks! Grab your seat on a stylish sports bike and show off the world that you can drive a motorcycle on any platform! Control the fastest motorbike by challenging your bike racing skills!

You would not like to miss out an opportunity to become the biggest motorbike racer of the city in this brand new racing game. Put your fingers on the arrow keys or tap the screen of your mobile phone to execute some insane stunts to earn some points! Choose your mode first and then select a level to enter this ultimate motorcycle driving game! Get points to upgrade your bike models! Wow! You would have multiple motorcycles to ride in a giant open-world map.

Be careful and try to race, jump or drift your motorbike to clear all the obstacles to reach the destination point! Do not hesitate in performing as many impossible stunts as you can while reaching the top of the skyscraper in this cool bike stunt game! Create your own motorcycle with the help of unlimited customization options! The unique gameplay and realistic physics can keep you busy for hours without download. So, what are you waiting for? Click the play button to enjoy the best motorbike simulator online today!
